articles.description: DAVID ATTENBOROUGH unleashed a furious rant about the Royal Family, accusing documentary makers of 'killing the monarchy', unearthed accounts reveal.

articles.author: Kirsty McCormack
articles.title: EastEnders hunk Paul Nicholls still smouldering at 41 as he takes a stroll with a woman in north London - The Sun
articles.content:
PAUL Nicholls was spotted enjoying a lovely post-Christmas stroll in Primrose Hill on Monday.
The 41-year-old actor is still sporting his smouldering good looks, which gave him a pin up status durin… [+2477 chars]

articles.title: Carol Vorderman, 60, plays her best assets for laughs - Daily Mail
articles.description: The voluptuous former Countdown star saw the funny side after noticing the studio webcam was trained on her prominent chest as she prepared to share social media content ahead of her show.
articles.content:
